author: Thomas Paine
message: The most formidable weapon against errors of every kind is reason.
title: Thought of the day

author: Danilo Dolci
message: It's important to know that words don't move mountains. Work, exacting work moves mountains.
title: Thought of the day

author: Franz Liszt
message: Beware of missing chances; otherwise it may be altogether too late some day.
title: Thought of the day

author: Buddha
message: You only lose what you cling to.
title: Thought of the day
